description: A welcome session with trainees and 10 Academy Team to learn more about 10 Academy and the Intensive Training (Batch 6) - More about Week 1

Grateful Friday
: 1 thing and/or 1 person within 10 AC you would like to thank and why. Tag that person to your thank you note. Hint: it can be someone who assisted you on some work, taught you something or any other thing within the 10 Academy community. Slack
Trainees will be working remotely independently on their daily challenge
Trainees will get a chance to understand the use of tenx system and how to navigate through - Also, get time to ask questions about it and who to contact with technical issues

Make us laugh:
 Trainees will be asked to post funny short stories (jokes) on slack and then comment or use emojis to react to each other's jokes. The post with the most laughter reaction wins!

Paper tap game:
 On Gmeet, trainees will be asked to turn their videos on, get a used paper and make a ball using it. Then they will be given 1 minute to tap the ball using one hand - if dropped you start from zero. The trainee with most number of taps (without dropping) within the minute wins. Response and the ball images to be posted on slack. Gmeet & Slack
20-minute long daily standup on Gmeet - Trainees pose questions, share challenges they are facing, and have chance to interact with tutors, and learn from their peers’ progress.
Trainees will be working remotely independently on their daily challenge
